BIO

Frontend Developer with a basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. My passion lies in transforming design concepts into pixel-perfect, responsive web interfaces. With a commitment to clean code and an eye for detail, I strive to create seamless user experiences. My goal is to make the web more visually appealing and user-friendly one project at a time.
